2.verification_summary: The claim aligns with standard equilibrium results for kinetic exchange models under detailed balance, yielding a Boltzmann-Gibbs exponential distribution with parameter set by mean money per agent.

5.verification_summary: The claim aligns with established observations of income distributions showing exponential bulk and Pareto tail, suggesting coexisting additive and multiplicative processes, but specifics depend on data and methods.

6.verification_summary: Based on the claim, agent-based simulations with equal initial money and additive transactions can reach a stationary exponential distribution when there is a positive lower boundary, with instability of equality and boundary conditions driving equilibrium.
